tool_description: Extracts detailed sales data for specified products and time periods, providing transaction-level insights and aggregated metrics for performance analysis.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to analyze

granularity.description: Data aggregation level: daily, weekly, monthly

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 timestamps.
Product IDs not found: One or more product IDs do not exist in the catalog.
Invalid granularity: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly].
Date range too large: Maximum allowed range is 2 years.
usage: Provide product_ids array, start_date, and end_date. Optionally specify granularity for data aggregation level. Returns sales metrics aggregated by the specified time period.

total_units_sold.description: Total number of units sold across all products

product_sales.description: Array of sales data strings per product
